title: Seismic Change
description:
Tim Kurkjian and Buster discuss a huge weekend in baseball, if the Guardians are true contenders in the AL, Dansby Swanson’s handling big moments, how the Mets will use Jacob deGrom heading into the postseason, the Mariners returning to the playoffs, Albert Pujols hitting 702 and Tony La Russa announcing his retirement. Plus, Sarah Langs plays The Numbers Game.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Tim Kurkjian and Buster discuss a huge weekend in baseball as the playoffs are nearly here. Plus, Sarah Langs plays The Numbers Game
